title: LatchVariableRead (Method)
text:
METHOD LatchVariableRead
Notification, that a latch variable  from TblAlarm has been read and can be processed.

rows.Name: diWhichRow
rows.Comment: A 0-based index of the row read from TblAlarm.

rows:
A 1-based index of the latch variable within all latch
variables

The latch value as ârawâ value.
If|iLatchVarType|has the value TYPE_STRING, this parameter contains a pointer to
the STRING, in case of TYPE_WSTRING this parameter contains a POINTER to a WSTRING

A TypeClass value representing the type of the latch
variable
Indicates, whether NULL is stored in the alarm storage
